Chrysler Group Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne vowed to keep the automaker on top of the minivan segment in the North American market and said the company will develop a new type of minivan by 2014. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne said to workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant on Tuesday, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and the Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made. and former Sen. Rick Santorum of Pennsylvania. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.___
